articles.title: U.S. airstrike hits suicide bombers targeting Kabul airport - CTV News
articles.description: A U.S. drone strike Sunday struck a vehicle carrying "multiple suicide bombers" from Afghanistan's Islamic State affiliate before they could target the ongoing military evacuation at Kabul's international airport, American officials said.
